com.r3.corda.networkmanage.common.cryptoservice.utimaco

Class UtimacoCryptoService

  • com.r3.corda.networkmanage.common.cryptoservice.utimaco.UtimacoCryptoService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CryptoService<T,U>

    public class UtimacoCryptoService
implements CryptoService<T,U>

    Implementation of a interface CryptoService that is backed by a Utimaco HSM.

    See Also:
    interface CryptoService

      void logOut()
      Reset the authentication state for the underlying crypto provider.
      byte[] sign(java.lang.String alias, byte[] data, java.lang.String signAlgorithm, java.lang.String password)
      Sign a ByteArray using the private key identified by the input alias. Returns the signature bytes formatted according to the signature scheme. The signAlgorithm if specified determines the signature scheme used for signing, if not specified then the signature scheme is based on the private key scheme.
      void updateCertificate(UtimacoKeyConfig keyConfig, java.util.List<? extends java.security.cert.X509Certificate> certificateChain)
      Update the certificate chain within the underlying key store.

      • sign

        public byte[] sign(java.lang.String alias,
                   byte[] data,
                   java.lang.String signAlgorithm,
                   java.lang.String password)

        Sign a ByteArray using the private key identified by the input alias. Returns the signature bytes formatted according to the signature scheme. The signAlgorithm if specified determines the signature scheme used for signing, if not specified then the signature scheme is based on the private key scheme.

        See Also:
        ByteArray

      • getSigner

        public NonExistentClass getSigner(java.lang.String alias,
                                  java.lang.String password)

        Returns ContentSigner for the key identified by the input alias.

        See Also:
        ContentSigner

      • generateRandomBigInteger

        public java.math.BigInteger generateRandomBigInteger(int sizeInBytes)

        Generate a random BigInteger using the underlying Provider.

        Parameters:
        sizeInBytes - size in bytes of the generated number, this determines the number precision, defaults to 16 bytes.
        See Also:
        Provider

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(UtimacoAuthenticationCredentials credentials)

        Authenticate a user against the underlying crypto provider using given credentials.

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated()

        Boolean flag indicating whether further authentication is needed to use stored keys.

      • getAuthenticatedUsers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAuthenticatedUsers()

      • logOut

        Reset the authentication state for the underlying crypto provider.
